articles.title: Gardaí extradite four men to Poland who 'posed a risk to communities in Ireland' - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: The men are all aged in their 40s and had previously been arrested on foot of a European Arrest Warrant issued by Polish authorities.
articles.content:
GARDAÍ HAVE HANDED over four men to the Polish National Police who posed a risk to communities in Ireland.
Earlier today, gardaí from the Garda Extradition Unit and the Garda National Bureau of Crim… [+775 chars]

articles.title: Britain's Sunak touts EU protocol progress in Northern Ireland, no deal yet - Reuters.com
articles.description: Britain's prime minister told Northern Ireland politicians on Friday that progress had been made on easing post-Brexit trade rules as he sought to keep the province's sceptical unionists on side in a final push for a deal with the European Union.

articles.title: Belgium names first national drug czar in fight against narco-terrorism - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The position is part of 7 new measures to tackle organized narcotics crime in Belgium.
articles.content:
